config.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
config.okzoomer.cinematic_camera.tooltip: Defines the cinematic camera while zooming.
config.okzoomer.reduce_sensitivity.toolt: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip: The behavior of the zoom key.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip.hold: "Hold" needs the zoom key to be hold.
config.okzoomer.zoom_mode.tooltip.toggle: "Toggle" has the zoom key toggle the zoom.
config.okzoomer.zoom_scrolling.tooltip: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.okzoomer.extra_keybinds.tooltip: Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key.
config.okzoomer.extra_keybinds.tooltip.w: A restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
config.okzoomer.zoom_overlay.tooltip.1: Adds an overlay in the screen during zoom.
config.okzoomer.zoom_overlay.tooltip.2: The overlay texture can be found in:
config.okzoomer.zoom_divisor.tooltip: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.okzoomer.minimum_zoom_divisor.too: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.okzoomer.maximum_zoom_divisor.too: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.okzoomer.scroll_step.tooltip.1: The number which is de/incremented by zoom scrolling.
config.okzoomer.scroll_step.tooltip.2: Used when the zoom divisor is above the starting point.
config.okzoomer.lesser_scroll_step.toolt: The number which is de/incremented by zoom scrolling.
Used when the zoom divisor is below the starting point.
config.okzoomer.cinematic_multiplier.too: The multiplier used for the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.okzoomer.smooth_multiplier.toolti: The multiplier used for smooth transitions.
config.okzoomer.minimum_linear_step.tool: The minimum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.okzoomer.maximum_linear_step.tool: The maximum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.okzoomer.reset_zoom_with_mouse.to: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
config.okzoomer.unbind_conflicting_key.t: If enabled, the "Save Toolbar Activator" keybind will be
unbound if there's a conflict with the zoom key.
config.okzoomer.print_owo_on_start.toolt: Prints a random owo in the console when the game starts.
config.okzoomer.hide_zoom_overlay.toolti: Hides the zoom overlay while the HUD's hidden.
config.okzoomer.reset_to_preset.tooltip: Resets the config in a specific way once saved.
"Classic" makes the mod imitate OptiFine's zoom.
"Persistent" is based on the "Persistent" zoom mode.
toast.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer
